thread.title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Tianyu Pharmaceutical passes review of high-tech enterprise recognition

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Tianyu Pharmaceutical passes review of high-tech enterprise recognition

organizations.name: reuters) - zhejiang tianyu pharmaceutical co ltd

text:
Jan 11(Reuters) - Zhejiang Tianyu Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
* Says it passes the review of high-tech enterprise recognition and will enjoy a tax preference of 15 percent for three years (2017 to 2019)
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/jMipXH
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
